Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete phases 1-7: full invoice management system

Implements hexagonal architecture with Next.js 16, Prisma, shadcn/ui.
Includes CFDI 4.0 XML generation, PDF invoices, ZIP bundles, PAC
integration \(Finkok/SW Sapien\), Discord reminders with ASCII art,
email sending via SMTP, exchange rate from Banxico, and full CRUD
with auth \(NextAuth v5 + Google\). Adds loading skeletons, error
boundaries, and not-found pages for polish.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
